cars.name: BMW M4 Competition
cars.description: A high-performance sports coupe with aggressive styling, twin-turbocharged engine, and luxury interior.

cars.name: Audi R8
cars.description: Audi’s flagship supercar with a V10 engine, quattro all-wheel drive, and iconic design.

cars.description: A luxury grand tourer combining thrilling performance with premium comfort and cutting-edge tech.

cars.name: Porsche 911 Carrera
cars.description: Legendary sports car known for its timeless design, rear-engine layout, and precise handling.

cars.description: Exotic supercar delivering raw performance with a naturally aspirated V10 and bold design.

cars.name: Ferrari F8 Tributo
cars.description: An Italian masterpiece combining aerodynamic efficiency, lightweight engineering, and supercar DNA.

cars.description: All-electric luxury sedan with record-breaking acceleration and futuristic technology.

cars.description: America’s muscle car icon with a supercharged V8 and aggressive styling.

cars.name: Chevrolet Corvette C8
cars.description: Mid-engine supercar with striking design, accessible price, and impressive performance.

cars.name: Nissan GT-R Nismo
cars.description: The legendary ‘Godzilla’ offering blistering performance, AWD stability, and Japanese engineering.

cars.name: BMW M5
cars.description: The BMW M5 is a high-performance sedan from the BMW M sub-brand, combining a powerful M Hybrid powertrain with a TwinPower Turbo V8 engine and an electric motor for impressive performance and enhanced efficiency.
